World Border: The world border will begin to shrink after 10 minutes of the game starting.
The final size of the world border will be 20x20. When the game starts information will be displayed on your hud.
You can toggle this on and off by using /coords.
There will be a 10 minute grace period and the world border will start moving at around 5 minutes.
You will be able to place and break blocks outside the world border.
Minutes after the world border has fully closed everyone alive will be given the glowing effect.
Mods: This topic can get a little controversial at times but the main gist of it is don't use anything that you give an unfair advantage to others.
If possible it is best to play with a vanilla client or a client without many mods.
Tweakaroo is the most controversial mod I see and what I can say is if you don't need it, it is just best not to use it.
I have no way of knowing if you are abusing this, but spectators are watching and punishment can be given if you are seen abusing it.
Teams: For main events, teams will always consist of 5 people.
This does not mean you need a full team to participate in the events.
For Practice Rounds or Fun Rules, team size may vary.
If you do not have a full team you are welcome to join another team for that event.
Miscellaneous:
- Players will drop golden apples on death.
- The End is allowed.

Description:
:scroll: `Portal Trapping is not allowed`
No one wants to die leaving or entering the Nether / End

:scroll: `Level 2 Potions are not allowed`
All level 2 potions are not allowed, this also includes instant health 1 and 2
Everything else is fair game

:scroll: `Sky Bases are a No`
No one wants to build up to a base in mid-air
Don't make a base in the sky Please.

:scroll: `Strip Mining is Allowed`
I've decided to make the change to allow strip mining
Way too many variables to deal with if disallowed :)

:scroll: `No Nether Roof`
Please. Just. Don't.

:scroll: `No Cross Teaming`
Cross Teaming will create an unfair advantage for other
teams, therefore not allowed.

:scroll: `Exploits / Mods`
Exploits are **strictly prohibited**.
As per mods, anything that would give you an advantage over
a vanilla client is not allowed. (Gentleman's Rules)

:scroll: `Family Friendly In Public`
When talking in a public voice chat or in general game chat try to stay as family friendly as possible

:exclamation: `Gentleman's rules`
These rules do not cover everything!
The use of loopholes to break these rules will result in punishment to you or your team.

:exclamation: `Ask Questions`
If something is unclear or you have a questions
feel free to ping Sensei!
